Class GameStateController

extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the saving and loading of game states.

      • previousStateFound

        public boolean previousStateFound()
        Checks if a previous game state is present in the default location.
        Returns:
        True if a game state is present in the states directory.

      • deletePreviousState

        public boolean deletePreviousState()
        Remove any previous state files saved
        Returns:
        true if deleted successfully or file never existed, false if file could not be deleted.
